    • setNonAccessibleTiles

      public void setNonAccessibleTiles() throws RuntimeException
      Sets specific tiles on the game board as non-accessible. This method defines a configuration of tiles that are considered non-accessible on the Spaceship board. It creates a SpaceShipTile with specific properties (e.g., connectors set to SMOOTH_SIDE, and tile type set to Tile_NonAccesiblePlace), and inserts these tiles at predefined positions on the board. These positions correspond to a specific layout and are intended to represent regions of the board that players cannot interact with.
      Specified by:
      setNonAccessibleTiles in class ShipBoard
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during the insertion of tiles.

    • removeWaitTilesForEndBuilding

      public void removeWaitTilesForEndBuilding() throws RuntimeException
      Removes the tiles that are in a waiting state for the end of building. This method is expected to handle any logic related to clearing or managing tiles that are marked as incomplete or pending during the construction phase.
      Specified by:

      Throws:

    • removeTile

      public void removeTile(int row, int column, boolean fromMistake) throws Exception
      Removes a tile from the ship grid at the specified row and column. It performs various operations based on the type of tile removed and updates the game state accordingly.
      Overrides:
      removeTile in class ShipBoard
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the tile to remove
      column - the column index of the tile to remove
      fromMistake - a flag indicating whether the removal occurred due to a player mistake or another game event
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the tile removal process

    • getTotalFirePower

      public float getTotalFirePower(ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> cannonPos, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> batteriesPos, Player player) throws RuntimeException
      Calculates the total firepower of the spaceship based on the positions of cannons and batteries, and updates battery charges accordingly.
      Specified by:
      getTotalFirePower in class ShipBoard
      Parameters:
      cannonPos - a list of positions of cannons on the spaceship, where each position is represented as a list of integers [row, col].
      batteriesPos - a list of positions of batteries on the spaceship, where each position is represented as a list of integers [row, col, charge required].
      player - the player who owns the spaceship, this parameter may influence the calculation in certain contexts.
      Returns:
      the total firepower of the spaceship as a float value.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if any error occurs during the calculation.

    • getTotalMotionPower

      public int getTotalMotionPower(ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> enginePos, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> batteriesPos, Player player) throws RuntimeException
      Calculates the total motion power of the spaceship based on the positions of engine tiles and the available charges in battery tiles. The method also adjusts the charges in battery tiles as necessary and accounts for additional motion power from other specific tile types.
      Specified by:
      getTotalMotionPower in class ShipBoard
      Parameters:
      enginePos - a list of lists, where each inner list represents the coordinates of an engine tile
      batteriesPos - a list of lists, where each inner list represents the coordinates and charges of a battery tile
      player - the player associated with this calculation
      Returns:
      the total motion power of the spaceship
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the calculation encounters an unexpected error or invalid inputs
